nodes.name: Web Frontend
nodes.description: The user-facing web interface that serves static assets and client-side application logic; it initiates API requests to the backend.

nodes.name: API Service
nodes.description: The backend API that implements business logic, validation, and orchestration; it serves requests from the frontend and reads/writes data to the database.

nodes.name: Application Database
nodes.description: Primary PostgreSQL database storing application state, user records, and transactional data.

relationships.description: Web Frontend issues HTTPS requests to the API Service for data and actions invoked by users.
API Service connects to the Application Database using PostgreSQL for reads and writes required by application workflows.
